attributes.action: Teachers to get a discount when they book holidays.
attributes.background: Teachers cannot choose when they go on holiday therefore they have to pay high prices. Using their Dfe number, they should be able to benefit from a discount on any holiday they book during these peak times.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to offer cheaper holiday packages for teachers would be one for holiday companies. 

You could raise this issue with holiday companies directly. 

If you want Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for holiday companies to increase their prices during school holidays, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225478
